description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"8s9gu","text":"Here we took advantage of a retrogradely-spreading adeno-associated viral vector
serotype 9 coding for the alpha-synuclein A53T mutated gene to induce a
widespread synucleinopathy of cortical and subcortical territories innervating
the putamen. Four weeks post-AAV deliveries animals were sacrificed and a
comprehensive biodistribution study was conducted, comprising the
quantification of neurons expressing alpha-synuclein, rostrocaudal distribution
and their specific location.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6p64","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44p2j","text":"This collection is made of (1) study design, (2) experimental animals, (3) viral vector production, (4) stereotaxic surgery for AAV deliveries, (5) necropsy, tissue processing and data analysis, (6) quantification of neurons expressing alpha-synuclein, (7) quantification of the nigrostriatal system","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g5h0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcarv","text":"4 literature references included","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l23i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71lb6","text":"3 figures included, as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95h6g","text":"- Figure 1: Viral vector (synapsin)AAV9-SynA53T","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49b6g","text":"- Figure 2: Ventriculography-assisted stereotaxic surgery","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7eefg","text":"- Figure 3: Quantification of alpha-synuclein positive neurons","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}
keywords: Alpha-synuclein, Lewy body dementia, adeno-associated viral vectors, gene therapy, Parkinson's disease
